body: I did a bit more refactoring and move the `resize_and_clear_` function into SparseTensorImpl.h to replace the `raw_resize_` function. In the `resize_and_clear_` function, since we are going to assign empty indices and values to the resized tensor, we won't need to check their original shapes.
body_html: I did a bit more refactoring and move the resize_and_clear_ function into SparseTensorImpl.h to replace the raw_resize_ function. In the resize_and_clear_ function, since we are going to assign empty indices and values to the resized tensor, we won't need to check their original shapes.
body_text: I did a bit more refactoring and move the resize_and_clear_ function into SparseTensorImpl.h to replace the raw_resize_ function. In the resize_and_clear_ function, since we are going to assign empty indices and values to the resized tensor, we won't need to check their original shapes.
